headline.print_headline: Persian Gulf Leaders See Danger, and Opportunity, in Trump Foreign Policy
headline.main: A President Trump Excites, and Worries, Persian Gulf Leaders

lead_paragraph: The leaders wonder if President Trump will support Syrian rebels, get tougher with Iran, or increase the American military’s presence in the region.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
